articles.description: UAB epidemiologist projects that Alabama could reach a threshold of having 72% of the population protected by May or June.
articles.content:
An epidemiologist at the University of Alabama at Birmingham projected that the country, and Alabama, could reach herd immunity to COVID-19 as early as May or June.
Were getting closer to herd immun… [+4701 chars]

articles.title: Louisiana deaths jumped by nearly 30% in 2020: How the victims died - NOLA.com
articles.description: It’s the cycle of life. Every year, about 43,000 Louisianans – give or take – shuffle off this mortal coil, the vast majority of them dying from natural causes.
articles.content:
Investigative reporting like this is more essential than ever. And its more expensive too. To fuel deep reporting like this, weve established a non-profit supported by readers like you.
